patthana20.1:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana20.1:2.1_1: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā
patthana20.1:3.1_0: Nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana20.1:3.1_1: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca
patthana20.1:4.1_0: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca
patthana20.1:4.1_1: nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñca nanahetuñca
patthana20.1:4.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.1:5.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.1:7.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana20.1:7.1_1: paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko
patthana20.1:7.1_2: ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.1:8.1_0: Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana20.1:8.1_1: paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko
patthana20.1:8.1_2: ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.1:9.1_0: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:9.1_1: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:9.1_2: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana20.1:10.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.1:11.1: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sahetukadukasadisaṁ.)
patthana20.1:12.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.1:13.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.1:15.1: Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.1:17.1: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.1:18.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
